alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Wind Advisory issued January 13 at 1:21PM PST until January 14 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Reno
info.description: ...LAKE WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST FRIDAY FOR LAKE TAHOE... * WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph through early Friday morning. Friday morning and afternoon winds will increase from the east at 15 to 25 mph, with gusts 35 to 40 mph expected. Wave heights 2 to 3 feet. * WHERE...Lake Tahoe. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Small boats, kayaks and paddle boards will be prone to capsizing and should remain off lake waters until conditions improve. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...West winds Thursday will transition to north and then east winds by Friday morning. Winds may decrease overnight before increasing Friday morning.
info.instruction: Check lake conditions before heading out and be prepared for a sudden increase in winds and wave heights. Consider postponing boating activities on the lake until a day with less wind.
